creator: tfan@kronos.com
text:
I builded Apache2.0.52 and jk2 connector module in AIX 5.2 succesfully,
but when I start Apache I get Segmentation fault and core dump,  than I run
dbx r -DONE-PROCESS with core which showed:
Segmentation fault in jk2_service_apache2_init at line 562 in file "" ($t1)
could not read "../../server/apache2/jk_service_apache2.c"

I am not sure why complained this source file,  Please advise.

creator: yoavs@computer.org
text:
Bugzilla is not a discussion forum: please use the tomcat-user list to ask why 
you're getting this.  Please only open a Bugzilla issue when you're sure the 
problem is not on your end, and then tell us exactly how to reproduce your 
problem.  Thanks.

BTW, if you know a Man Zhang who works for Kronos, tell her I said hi ;)
